text: Has anyone integrated ClearSide with HubSpot? Looking to import our data from ClearSide into HubSpot
If you can get data out into CSV should not be a problem
<@UMSS3FZ1A> Thanks for getting back to me. This is something we want to be able to do regularly.
Is it possible to set up Import2 Wizard to do this then set to run on a cron job?
We don’t have direct clearside integration, yet. but yes you can automate csv files upload using auto-import feature
ok will check on ClearSide to see how easy to get csv. Are Import2 able to help setup integration?
Sure, just reach out through help chat or <mailto:help@import2.com|help@import2.com>
I have filled in my details on the Import2 website so hope to hear back soon
Is there a way for me to add ID into my navigation menu options, like `<li id="myID"> <a> option 1 </a> </li>`

Hey <@UK4FUHGG3> you'd need to use the hubl menu function to create your own markup. the default advanced menu module won't do this on its own. I'd suggest building a custom module based on the menu function

using the menu function you can create a custom menu with any structure you’d like:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#menu>

Example of how it could be used:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/TheWebTech-Basic-Menu-using-Menu-Function?hsLang=en>
Thank you guys! <@UBT0AHWLD> told me that adding `<span>` into the menu option would do the trick

Woohoooo!!! After 6 months of pounding my head on the keyboard, I just released a FREAKIN’ HUGE upgrade to my CLEAN template series for HubSpot.

Wanted to give a special shout and :right-facing_fist::left-facing_fist: to <@U7SL518D6> <@U38EZFVFE> and this awesome HS Community for all the help along the way.

If you’re interested in checking out my demo site, have at it.  Love any and all feedback.  Just DM me.

<https://www.HubSpothero.com/clean6/demo>
Does anyone kniw how to ad a signature box to a HubSpot form?

Congrats <@UA5DFM7CK> !!!  :tada:Excited to check it out.

Is it <#CDU990ECW|drag-n-drop-pages> friendly? :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks <@U22PKFRU5>.  You bet it is and SO MUCH MORE.
